text: Ageratinastrum is a group of plants in the sunflower family described as a genus in 1932.Mattfeld, Johannes. 1932. Notizblatt des Botanischen Gartens und Museums zu Berlin-Dahlem 11: 412Tropicos, Ageratinastrum Mattf. The genus is native to tropical Africa.Flann, C (ed) 2009+ Global Compositae Checklist ==Species== * Ageratinastrum goetzeanum (O.Hoffm.) Mattf. * Ageratinastrum katangense Lisowski * Ageratinastrum lejolyanum (Adamska & Lisowski) Kalanda * Ageratinastrum palustre Wild & G.V.Pope * Ageratinastrum polyphyllum (Baker) Mattf. ==References== Category:Asteraceae genera Category:Flora of Africa Category:Vernonieae
title: Ageratinastrum
